jsocket.cipher

Interface Crypto

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AES, RSA
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AESImpl, CryptoImpl, RSAImpl

    public interface Crypto
    A cryptographic service for encrypting/decrypting data This is a base interface in the cryptographic hierarchy
    Version:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Will Czifro

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Crypto.KeySize
      An enum for different key sizes

      byte[] decrypt(byte[] cipher)
      Decrypts a cipher using an underlying algorithm
      static java.lang.String decryptByteArrayToString(byte[] cipher, Crypto crypto)
      Allows for a single method call to decrypt a byte array into a string

      Encrypts data using an underlying algorithm

    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        byte[] encrypt(byte[] data)
        Encrypts data using an underlying algorithm
        Parameters:
        data - a byte array that is to be encrypted
        Returns:
        a byte array that has been processed by the encryption algorithm

      • decrypt

        byte[] decrypt(byte[] cipher)
        Decrypts a cipher using an underlying algorithm
        Parameters:
        cipher - a byte array that is to be decrypted
        Returns:
        a byte array that has been processed by the decryption algorithm

      • newInstance

        static Crypto newInstance(java.lang.String algorithm)
        Returns a new instance of a Crypto object that uses a specified algorithm.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - a string value that specifies which underlying algorithm to use
        Returns:
        a Crypto instance

      • encryptStringToByteArray

        static byte[] encryptStringToByteArray(java.lang.String plainText,
                                       Crypto crypto)
        Allows for a single method call to encrypt a string
        Parameters:
        plainText - a string vale that will be encrypted
        crypto - a cryptographic service that will encrypt the string
        Returns:
        a byte array that is the encrypted version of the string

      • decryptByteArrayToString

        static java.lang.String decryptByteArrayToString(byte[] cipher,
                                                 Crypto crypto)
        Allows for a single method call to decrypt a byte array into a string
        Parameters:
        cipher - an encrypted byte array
        crypto - a cryptographic service that will decrypt the byte array
        Returns:
        the string value that the cipher was hiding
